# Introduction

The HP DeskJet 4155e Wireless Color Inkjet Printer is designed for home users seeking a reliable and versatile printing solution. With its ability to print, scan, and copy, this compact printer is perfect for everyday tasks, from printing recipes to important documents. Its user-friendly features, including mobile printing capabilities and a three-month supply of Instant Ink, make it a noteworthy option for those looking to streamline their home office setup.

## Versatile Functionality

The HP DeskJet 4155e stands out with its multifunctional capabilities. Users can print, scan, and copy in vibrant color, making it suitable for a variety of tasks. The printer boasts print speeds of up to 8.5 pages per minute in black and 5.5 pages per minute in color, ensuring that users can complete their printing jobs quickly. Additionally, the dual-band Wi-Fi with self-reset functionality helps maintain a stable connection, automatically resolving any connectivity issues that may arise.

## User-Friendly Setup and Connectivity

Setting up the HP DeskJet 4155e is designed to be straightforward, even for those who may not be tech-savvy. The HP Smart App provides a step-by-step guided setup process, allowing users to connect their printer to their mobile devices effortlessly. Once connected, users can print, scan, and copy documents from anywhere, enhancing convenience. The inclusion of a USB 2.0 port also offers an alternative connection option for those who prefer a wired setup.

## Instant Ink Subscription

One of the standout features of the HP DeskJet 4155e is the three-month trial of the Instant Ink subscription service included with HP+. This service allows users to print up to 700 pages per month, with ink delivered directly to their door when needed. After the trial period, users can choose to continue the service for a monthly fee, which can save them up to 50% on ink costs. However, some users have expressed concerns about the subscription model, feeling it may lead to higher long-term costs.

## Customer Experiences

Customer reviews of the HP DeskJet 4155e reveal a mix of satisfaction and frustration. Many users appreciate the printer's ease of setup and reliable performance, noting that it prints consistently without errors. However, some have encountered challenges, particularly with the initial setup and connectivity. A few customers reported issues with missing ink cartridges upon delivery, which led to confusion and delays in getting started.

While some users praised HP's customer service for their responsiveness and willingness to resolve issues, others expressed dissatisfaction with the quality of the printer itself, citing problems such as flimsy construction and software glitches. Despite these concerns, many users found the printer to be a good value for the price, especially for basic home printing needs.

## Conclusion

The HP DeskJet 4155e Wireless Color Inkjet Printer offers a blend of functionality, convenience, and affordability, making it a solid choice for home users. Its ability to print, scan, and copy, combined with mobile printing capabilities and a trial of the Instant Ink service, enhances its appeal. However, potential buyers should be aware of mixed customer experiences regarding setup and durability. Overall, for those seeking a reliable home printer for everyday tasks, the HP DeskJet 4155e is worth considering, provided users are prepared for the nuances of its subscription model and potential customer service interactions.
